mutants.original_line: return [s[i:] + s[:i] for i in range(len(s))]
mutants.mutated_line: return [s[i:] - s[:i] for i in range(len(s))]

mutants.original_line: return [s[i:] + s[:i] for i in range(len(s))]
mutants.mutated_line: return [s[i:] * s[:i] for i in range(len(s))]

mutants.original_line: return ''.join([c for c in s.lower() if c.isalnum()])
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join([c for c in s.lower() if c.isalnum()])
